titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2471.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2471.

action.text: Ms. DeLauro asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The Clerk was authorized to correct section numbers, punctuation, and cross references, and to make other necessary technical and conforming corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 2471.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2471 (Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022) to amend the title of the bill.
